wine.name: Chateau Musar Cinsault
wine.comment: The famed Lebanese producer's only mono-varietal wine. This barrel of Cinsault was 'discovered' by Serge Hochar deep within the Musar cellars, likely a forgotten leftover ingredient for a vintaged blend. Only 3000 bottles made

wine.name: Domaine Didier Dagueneau 'Blanc...etc.'
wine.comment: Known as a maverick in the Loire Valley, Dagueneau focuses on distinct soil types to highlight his wines stark minerality

wine.name: Perrier-Jouët 'Belle Époque Brut'
wine.comment: The tete de cuvee of one of Champagne's most prestigious producers, and the only item in their lineup where they declare a vintage.
